pricingModal.title: Customized billing
pricingModal.description: Customized billing plan: suitable for merchants with large transaction volumes or special business models.

geoRestriction.title: Cross-border Services Restrictions
geoRestriction.paragraph1: You are trying to access our website from an IP address located outside Hong Kong.
geoRestriction.paragraph2: Please note that the promotion and/or distribution of our products and/or services outside Hong Kong may require a licence. The content of our website is only addressed to Hong Kong residents, domiciled in Hong Kong.
geoRestriction.paragraph3: If you are a resident domiciled outside Hong Kong and do not wish to visit our website, please close this page. If you still want to visit our website, click Continue and in doing so, you confirm that you have read and understood the above and that you are accessing our website on your own initiative without active promotion or solicitation from Lavas.

disclosures.companyRegistration: Lavas Labs Limited is a Hong Kong registered company responsible for global business operations (excluding the United States).
disclosures.usBusiness: LAVAS LABS, INC. NMLS ID: 2777990 is responsible for United States business operations.
disclosures.visaCards: Visa cards in the United States are issued by Sutton Bank, Member FDIC. Visa cards in Hong Kong are issued by Reap Technology.
disclosures.vaAccount: US VA accounts are provided by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, where funds are held in custody.
disclosures.visaAgent: Lavas Labs Limited is a registered Third Party Agent of Visa.
